sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; import { useCart } from '../context/CartContext'; import { Package, ShoppingBag, Heart, User, MapPin, Phone, Mail, Clock, CheckCircle, Truck, Star, MessageCircle, CreditCard, AlertCircle, Calendar, Search, Filter, Download, Eye } from 'lucide-react'; const UserDashboard = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('overview'); const [orders, setOrders] = useState([]); const [wishlist, setWishlist] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { fetchUserData(); }, []); const fetchUserData = async () => { try { // Mock data for now setOrders([]); setWishlist([]); setLoading(false); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching user data:', error); setLoading(false); } }; const getStatusIcon = (status) => { switch (status) { case 'received': return ; case 'in-progress': return ; case 'out-for-delivery': return ; case 'delivered': return ; default: return ; } }; const getStatusColor = (status) => { switch (status) { case 'received': return 'bg-blue-100 text-blue-800'; case 'in-progress': return 'bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800'; case 'out-for-delivery': return 'bg-orange-100 text-orange-800'; case 'delivered': return 'bg-green-100 text-green-800'; case 'cancelled': return 'bg-red-100 text-red-800'; default: return 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-800'; } }; const tabs = [ { id: 'overview', label: 'Overview', icon: }, { id: 'orders', label: 'My Orders', icon: }, { id: 'wishlist', label: 'Wishlist', icon: }, { id: 'profile', label: 'Profile', icon: } ]; if (loading) { return (
); } return (
{/* Welcome Header */}

Welcome back, {user?.name}!

We're happy to see you again. Here's what's happening with your orders.

{/* Quick Stats */}

Total Orders

{orders.length}

Delivered

{orders.filter(order => order.status === 'delivered').length}

Cart Items

0

Wishlist

{wishlist.length}

{/* Tab Navigation */}
{tabs.map((tab) => ( ))}
{/* Tab Content */}
{activeTab === 'overview' && (

Recent Orders

{orders.length === 0 ? (

No orders yet

Start Shopping
) : (
{orders.slice(0, 3).map((order) => (
{getStatusIcon(order.status)}

Order #{order.id}

{new Date(order.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()}

{order.status.replace('-', ' ').toUpperCase()}

{order.totalAmount}

))}
)}
)} {activeTab === 'orders' && (

All Orders

{orders.length === 0 ? (

No orders found

You haven't placed any orders yet. Start shopping to see your orders here.

Browse Products
) : (
{orders.map((order) => (

Order #{order.id}

Placed on {new Date(order.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()}

{order.status.replace('-', ' ').toUpperCase()}
Expected delivery: {order.expectedDelivery ? new Date(order.expectedDelivery).toLocaleDateString() : 'TBD'}
Total: {order.totalAmount}
))}
)}
)} {activeTab === 'wishlist' && (

My Wishlist

{wishlist.length === 0 ? (

Your wishlist is empty

Save items you love to your wishlist and shop them later.

Discover Products
) : (
{wishlist.map((product) => (

{product.name}

{product.shortDescription}

{product.price}
))}
)}
)} {activeTab === 'profile' && (

Profile Information

{user?.name}
{user?.email}
{user?.phone}
{user?.address}
)}
{/* Quick Actions */}

Continue Shopping

Discover more amazing products

Browse Products

Need Help?

Contact us for any queries

WhatsApp Us

Leave a Review

Share your experience with others

); }; export default UserDashboard;
